  4.  def Assign[K, V](topicPartitions: Collection[TopicPartition], kafkaParams: Map[String, AnyRef]): ConsumerStrategy[K, V]

    Assign a fixed collection of TopicPartitions

    Assign a fixed collection of TopicPartitions

    topicPartitions

    collection of TopicPartitions to assign

    kafkaParams

    Kafka configuration parameters to be used on driver. The same params will be used on executors, with minor automatic modifications applied. Requires "bootstrap.servers" to be set with Kafka broker(s) specified in host1:port1,host2:port2 form.

  5.  def Assign[K, V](topicPartitions: Collection[TopicPartition], kafkaParams: Map[String, AnyRef], offsets: Map[TopicPartition, Long]): ConsumerStrategy[K, V]

    topicPartitions

  12.  def SubscribePattern[K, V](pattern: Pattern, kafkaParams: Map[String, AnyRef]): ConsumerStrategy[K, V]

    Subscribe to all topics matching specified pattern to get dynamically assigned partitions.

    Subscribe to all topics matching specified pattern to get dynamically assigned partitions. The pattern matching will be done periodically against topics existing at the time of check.

    pattern

    pattern to subscribe to

    kafkaParams

    Kafka configuration parameters to be used on driver. The same params will be used on executors, with minor automatic modifications applied. Requires "bootstrap.servers" to be set with Kafka broker(s) specified in host1:port1,host2:port2 form.

  13.  def SubscribePattern[K, V](pattern: Pattern, kafkaParams: Map[String, AnyRef], offsets: Map[TopicPartition, Long]): ConsumerStrategy[K, V]

    Subscribe to all topics matching specified pattern to get dynamically assigned partitions.

    Subscribe to all topics matching specified pattern to get dynamically assigned partitions. The pattern matching will be done periodically against topics existing at the time of check.

    pattern

    pattern to subscribe to

    kafkaParams

    Kafka configuration parameters to be used on driver. The same params will be used on executors, with minor automatic modifications applied. Requires "bootstrap.servers" to be set with Kafka broker(s) specified in host1:port1,host2:port2 form.
